summary: This document consists of internal emails discussing a Fircosoft alert related to Darren Indyke. The alert was reviewed and cleared from an Anti-Money Laundering (AML) perspective by Lauren Brooks, an AML Compliance Officer at DB USA Core Corporation. The correspondence highlights the process of clearance required for compliance prior to KYC approval.

keyFacts: A Fircosoft alert was generated for Darren Indyke on August 20, 2018.
The alert was cleared by Lauren Brooks on August 31, 2018, after prior review.
Compliance clearance is required before proceeding with KYC approval for clients.
